item.title: How to build your static site with Hugo
item.description: In a pair of previous posts I described how to host a static site in Azure storage and also how to use a CDN to map a custom domain to your site with https. For each of those examples I used a simple ‘hello world’ html page, but in the real world we are going to want more out of our site. In my research I came across Hugo and decided to give it a go.
